name: The Art of Jordan Inglee | Collector Passes

metadata.name: The Ghosts of Elowah | Collector Pass
metadata.description:
**UPDATE 8/21/2022**

***A Ghost of Elowah, B-Side ***

***A free to claim ERC1155 edition of 50 for Ghost of Elowah Collector Pass holders, created using manifold.xyz claim app**

***Link to manifold claim app:  
https://app.manifold.xyz/c/ghosts-of-elowah***

***1:1 Mint per Collector Pass held (airdropped to Ghost of Elowah Collectors) until 8/28/2022 900PM PST***

***If you have a different wallet you want to use - contact Jordan (https://twitter.com/jordaninglee)***

---

**UPDATE 8/17/2022**

***Collector Pass Holders will get a free claim mint via @manifold for a new piece of art starting Sunday 8/21/2022***

***Snapshot will happen on 8/20/2022 - so be sure to have your pass in a minting wallet!***

---

On August 15th, 2021, the last piece of The Ghosts of Elowah was collected and changed the course of my life.

As a way to give thanks to those who supported this collection - I've created The Ghosts Collector Pass - a token of gratitude.

From the bottom of my heart - thank you for believing in me and my art- it means the world!

Collector Pass Perks (TLDR) 

- Early Access & CP only mints  
- Airdrops & giveaways  
- Physical artwork/merch  
- IRL / Online opportunities  
 (workshops, photography/business help ect)

Read the Tweet Thread here:  
https://twitter.com/jordaninglee/status/1559607719396401152?s=20&t=oRZcTrh4iBsvpkWNecFkIQ

------

The Ghosts of Elowah Collector Pass is a "dynamic" ERC1155 token.  The art and metadata will be updated as further utility is revealed and is a way to keep collectors updated "on-chain"

*If we aren't in touch on social PLEASE contact 
[Jordan on twitter @jordaninglee](https://twitter.com/jordaninglee)
